Talk_2003:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I thought I'd go to Kakariko Village for
fortified pumpkins and swift carrots, so of
course it started raining. Just my luck.
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I still need to repay you for what you did
back at Kakariko Village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>I hope that innkeeper's doing all right.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>He falls asleep every single time you take
your eyes off him. It doesn't inspire much
confidence as a customer.
Talk_2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I ate all the fortified pumpkins and
swift carrots I'd stocked up on in
the village.<sp:0:4:0>Once I finish up here, I need to remember
to go shopping in Kakariko Village.<sp:0:4:0>And while I'm there, I might as well make
a stop at that inn.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Once I rest up, I'll be hitting the road
again. I've stayed here too long as it is.<sp:0:4:0>Before I go, though, I need to pick up a
ring garland as a souvenir.
Talk_2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Not surprised you've got enough guts to
walk around, uh, "free."<sp:0:4:0>But go find someone else to talk to,
all right?<sp:0:4:0>I don't want people thinking I know you.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Fortified pumpkins and swift carrots are
this village's signature crops, right?<sp:0:4:0>Suppose it wouldn't hurt to go try some
before I get back on the road...
